# React Template Technology Stack

1. React 19
2. React Router 7
3. React Query 5
4. TypeScript 5
5. Ant Design 6
6. Zustand 4 (if needed)
7. SCSS 8 (if needed)
8. React Hook Form 8 (if needed)
